notes.body: We’re continuing to investigate this issue, but we don’t have new information to share currently. Thank you for your patience, we'll be back with an update in 30 minutes time.

Some customers may be encountering issues with legacy message attachments on version 4.28.182 of the Slack desktop app. Some messages are being rendered with URLs instead of links. 

We are investigating the problem and we apologise for the disruption.
